FuncDef: This command specifies whether parameter-problem ICMP messages should be sent. When enabled, parameter-problem ICMP messages are generated by this interface.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the number of parameter-problem ICMP messages to send in the time frame specified by the seconds parameter. Values-10 to 1000. ParamDefault: Default- 100
Specifies the time frame, in seconds, that is used to limit the number of parameter-problem ICMP messages issued. Values-1 to 60. ParamDefault: Default- 10
